In doing medical missionary work we shall meet the same opposition that Christ met. He declares: "Ye shall be hated of all men for My name's sake: but he that endureth to the end shall be saved. But when they persecute you in this city, flee ye into another: for verily I say unto 
                                                                           528
you, Ye shall not have gone over the cities of Israel, till the Son of man be come." Matthew 10:22, 23.
